W: Whenever another Goblin you control dies, you gain 1 life.
Whenever a Goblin you control becomes blocked, you may tap target creature.
Whenever one or more Goblins you control attack, creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn.
U: Whenever another Goblin you control becomes tapped, scry 1.
Whenever a Goblin you control deals combat damage to a player, draw a card, then discard a card.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target Goblin you control gain flying until end of turn.
B: Whenever another Goblin you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Whenever this creature or another Goblin you control dies, you may pay {B}. If you do, draw a card and lose 1 life.
Whenever a Goblin you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
At the beginning of your end step, if a Goblin died this turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
Whenever another Goblin you control leaves the battlefield, surveil 1.
Whenever one or more Goblins you control die, each opponent loses X life, where X is the number of Goblins that died this turn.
Whenever this creature attacks, you may sacrifice another Goblin. If you do, target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
Whenever a nontoken Goblin you control dies, you may return target Goblin card with lesser mana value from your graveyard to your hand.
Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
R: Whenever this creature or another Goblin enters the battlefield under your control, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever another Goblin you control enters the battlefield, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever a Goblin you control attacks, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever one or more Goblins you control attack, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token tapped and attacking.
Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 1 damage to up to one target creature defending player controls.
Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
Whenever another Goblin you control dies, this creature deals 1 damage to any target.
Whenever you cast a Goblin spell, this creature deals 1 damage to any target.
Whenever you cast a Goblin spell, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
Whenever this creature or another Goblin you control becomes blocked, Goblins you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever a Goblin you control deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token.
Whenever another Goblin you control becomes tapped, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever another Goblin you control attacks, you may have this creature also attack that player or planeswalker.
Whenever this creature attacks, you may sacrifice another Goblin. If you do, this creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more Goblins, this creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.
Whenever another Goblin you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and it deals 1 damage to each opponent.
At the beginning of your end step, if a Goblin you control dealt damage to an opponent this turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
Whenever a Goblin you control becomes the target of a spell you control, this creature deals 1 damage to any target.
Whenever a Goblin you control becomes the target of a spell an opponent controls, this creature deals 2 damage to that player.
Whenever another Goblin you control enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
Whenever this creature enters the battlefield or attacks, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
Whenever a Goblin you control attacks alone, it gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
Whenever one or more Goblins you control become blocked, create that many 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
Whenever another Goblin you control dies, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.
Whenever you sacrifice a Goblin, this creature deals 2 damage to any target.
Whenever this creature attacks, you may sacrifice another Goblin. If you do, this creature deals damage equal to its power to any target.
Whenever another Goblin you control attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, that creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each attacking Goblin.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token. It gains haste until end of turn.
Whenever a Goblin you control is dealt damage, this creature deals 1 damage to any target.
Whenever another Goblin you control becomes blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature blocking it.
Whenever a Goblin you control deals combat damage to a player, that player mills two cards.
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Goblins you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever this creature becomes tapped, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
Whenever another Goblin you control enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life.
Whenever a Goblin you control blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control four or more Goblins, this creature deals 2 damage to each opponent.
Whenever a Goblin you control dies, this creature deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
Whenever you cast a Goblin spell, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Then if it has three or more +1/+1 counters on it, it deals 3 damage to any target.

Whenever this creature or another Goblin you control attacks, create a tapped and attacking token that is a copy of that creature, except it is not legendary. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step.
Whenever another Goblin you control becomes the target of a spell you control, untap that creature. It gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Whenever a Goblin you control enters the battlefield, if you control exactly one Goblin, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
Whenever another Goblin you control leaves the battlefield, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each Goblin you controlled that left the battlefield this turn.
Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, you may sacrifice another Goblin. If you do, this creature deals 3 damage to each creature blocking or blocked by it.
Whenever one or more Goblins you control deal combat damage to a player, add {R} for each of those creatures.
Whenever a Goblin you control becomes tapped for mana or to pay a cost, this creature deals 1 damage to each opponent.
Whenever you cast a Goblin spell from exile, this creature deals 2 damage to any target.
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
Whenever another Goblin you control enters the battlefield, this creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other Goblin you control.
At the beginning of your end step, if you sacrificed a Goblin this turn, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
Whenever another Goblin you control dies, this creature deals 1 damage to each planeswalker your opponents control.
Whenever a Goblin you control attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card and this creature deals 1 damage to any target.
Whenever another Goblin you control becomes blocked, this creature gains first strike until end of turn.
Whenever this creature attacks, create a tapped and attacking 1/1 red Goblin creature token for each other attacking Goblin.
Whenever a Goblin you control becomes tapped, if it is the second time this turn that Goblin became tapped, this creature deals 2 damage to any target.
Whenever this creature or another Goblin you control is dealt damage, this creature deals that much damage to any target.
G: Whenever another Goblin you control enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
Whenever a Goblin you control deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more Goblins, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn.
Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target Goblin you control fight target creature you do not control.
Whenever a Goblin you control dies, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
C: Whenever another Goblin you control enters the battlefield, untap this creature.
Whenever a colorless artifact enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
Whenever this creature or another Goblin you control deals combat damage to a player, put a charge counter on target artifact you control.
